features: HEPA Air Purifiers Pets and Home: Clarifion DSTx uses a negative ionizer plus a HEPA Filter that may help reduce airborne dust, smoke, pet dander, odors and may help improve air in any room.

Perfect Air Purifier for Home: We recommend using at least one per bedroom, bathroom, dining room, living room, and kitchen to ensure best results. It is advisable to place the device near windows and doors for optimal results.

CARB Certified and Complies With The Federal Ozone Emissions Limit: Breathe fresher air with Clarifion DSTx air system for the home. DSTx HEPA filter air purifiers emits negative ions which may cling to dust and allergens, and may weigh them to the ground.

Carbon Filter Air Purifier: With an activated carbon layer in the HEPA filter, DSTx room air filter may help to absorb unwanted odors and smoke in kitchens, bathrooms, and more so you and your loved ones can enjoy ionized air.

Quiet Air Filtration: DSTx air purifier for bedroom is whisper quiet, so you can go about your day and night totally undisturbed. With a dual-speed fan, choose from high or low speeds depending on your air purification needs.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Next page 1 HOW IT WORKS 2 FIGHT INDOOR POLLUTANTS 3 HEPA FILTER SYSTEM 4 COMPACT DESIGN 5 WHERE TO USE DSTX

How does Clarifion DSTx work? The compact generator releases negative ions that latch onto airborne pollutants, weighing them down so they sink to the ground. The Carbon Composite layer helps neutralize odors. The HEPA filters provide elite filtration for fresh, light air. Where can I use it? We recommend using at least one in bedrooms, bathrooms, dining rooms, living rooms, small office spaces, and more. Does Clarifion require installation? Just open the box and plug it in! It starts working as soon as it’s plugged in, so you’ll have it releasing negative ions in less than 60 seconds. Will it work on any outlet? Yes! It works in any standard outlet, making it incredibly convenient to use in any room, even in hotels and offices! Are the filter replacements expensive? No, the compact design makes them far less expensive than leading air filter replacements. Plus, you’ll get an additional 10% off when you sign-up for a convenient refill subscription.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Clarifion - DSTx Portable Air Purifier/Plug In Air Ionizer
reviews.reviewText: 11JUN23 - Received the Clarifion plug in air purifier today. Immediately read the instructions, plugged it in my bedroom, and set it for high. Before I go to bed tonight, I'll relocate it to my living room. I like the blue light; the sound level on high (to me) is quite bearable. The item was well packaged but it did come in a larger box with other items I had purchased from Amazon. I paid $35.84 with a 10% discount for anyone comparing prices. Since I only just received this, I'll write another review in a few weeks to let folks know how this mini air purifier works out.18JUL23 - Noticed a price jump to $39.99 and no discount today. Been using this Clarifion DSTx purifier for a few weeks now and it has worked better than expected. I do not have allergies but I do have a dry cough that would occasionally wake me up in the middle of the night. I've been using this unit in my bedroom and would run it on high, with the higher blue light setting, from the time I woke up in the morning to about 10pm at night. Then I would unplug it from the wall and go to bed. I actually sleep through the night without coughing. I don't know how to explain that there is a distinct difference in the air quality after this unit is used. The air smells fresher and, after taking a really deep breath, it's like the inhaled air reaches all the way down to my toes. Doesn't make sense, I know. However, this mini air purifier DOES work quite well and I do recommend it highly. Since you're probably asking why do I unplug it before going to sleep? The first few days I let it run all day and night. Then I went back and read all the reviews. Well, a lot of those reviews stated some folks experienced smudge marks on the unit as well as their wall outlet and showed photos as proof. I got the impression that folks were letting the unit run 24-hours a day, 7 days a week most likely on the highest setting. Because of the smoke drifting down southward from the Canadian wildfires, I can see why this unit was run constantly. But since I didn't want to experience any smudges nor take the chance that this unit would burn itself out, that's why I turn it off, unplug it from the wall, and let it "rest" until I plug it in the next day. I'd rather be safe than sorry, but the unit does work and I want it to last a good long while. Good seller, highly recommend this unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I wanted something for the bedrooms that would be quiet yet still do what it is suppose to do...clean the air. This is perfect at night as it is extremely quiet. It does have a dim light that can be turned off but it makes for a great night light. I 've only had it less than a week but so far I'm loving it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little air filter for small office
reviews.reviewText: I've been surprised and pleased with how well this works. My office is 6x8 with 11ft ceilings so 528 cubic feet and that's what this unit is designed for. I would always have a weird smell from the carpet and our janitor started using a very high potent floor cleaner that would just knock me out, but this made everything okay. I really like it a lot. I used to work at IQAir and know a lot about air filtration. Was very skeptical about this unit, but it exceeded my expectations. I've been using this for about 3 months. It's a little loud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small and Mighty Travel Purifier
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This air purifier is a must have for the house and travel. While its not for a large room uts perfect for a bedroom, bathroom or any other room in the house where you want to help with allergies or just filter and purify the air. My husband and I were getting allergies from a lot of remodeling happening in our home, when I heard about this small air purifier we knew it would be great for all our bedrooms. Its been the best purchase of the year! Within a day our home smells better, our allergies started to clear up, and it’s super cute and easy to plug in and move around the house. My daughter likes the nightlight feature, which you can dim or even turn off completely within the two different fan speeds. It is a bit bulky when you first open it but once plugged in it looks sleek and ends up being a conversation piece when noticed by friends and family. I also love that we can take it when we travel to use in hotel rooms which never seem to have great breathable air!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Noisy if you want it to work well.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to remove smells from my apartment. The one i put near my cats litter box has completely removed the smell unless you are standing on top of it. However it does not seem to work as well on cigarette smoke. Ammonia smells this thing is beast, cigarette smoke may be to much for 1 to handle, so i'll buy more.

reviews.reviewerName: Jamie Blackwood - Just Like Playing HouseJamie Blackwood - Just Like Playing House
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars NOTICEABLE difference in the air quality
reviews.reviewText: I started noticing my allergies after we got our dog a year ago. She sleeps on the ground right next to my side of the bed and I was waking up sneezing and congested. The Clarifion plug-in air purifier has made a significant difference in how I feel in the mornings. I plug it in right next to the dogs bed and I have not had those allergy symptoms at all since I started using the purifier just over a month ago. Not only is it effective, but it is compact and has multiple settings (light, no light, quiet mode, high speed, low speed). I have also used it in the kitchen after cooking fish, plugged it in after dinner and couldn’t even tell fish had been cooked the next morning. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works well, but funny noise
reviews.reviewText: Works well, I saw improvement in air quality even with this small unit. Has two speed levels, the lower one is whisper soft. The higher speed made usual fan noise and expected. The problem I had is after a couple of months it started to make a very annoying rattling sound. It temporarily stopped but started up again and I can not use it in the bedroom.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve only had it one day so I can’t say much. I received it just fine and it is as described.
